document_data.caption: A map showing Shanty Lane and surroundings in the Field Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Shanty Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Shanty Lane''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Shanty Lane was located in the eastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Field Ward|Field Ward]]. The road branched east off of [[Chop Street]], eventually terminating at a dead end of unnamed alleys.
